name: The Curse of the Werewolves
description: Welcome to the Curse of the Werewolves - a hidden object adventure game with blood-chilling visuals and an enthralling storyline.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8 Processor: 1.8 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Not bad. A bit simple. The plot is a bit weak, the puzzles pretty easy. The ending a bit disappointing. I completed it in 2h. So, maybe not worth 9,99$. Better wait for a lower price.
Cute little game, not really that difficult. I've played it completely twice and have enjoyed it. The ending was predictable, but altogether a very cute story. I'm now wishing it were a bit longer.
